about: I'm an iOS developer based in London with three years experience developing applications using Swift, Objective-C, and Node.js. I am currently working at NET-A-PORTER on the iOS team and have deveoped apps for iPhone, iPad Apple TV.

mission-statement.statement: Having started my career within a graduate scheme, I was fortunate enough to experience a multitude of different elements of web development before deciding on a career in iOS development. I hope to continue to develop within a team environment and also by working on my own personal projects which allow me to discover and experiment with new technologies. As I gain more experience, I want to bring my enthusiasm and passion for technologies to all teams I work with and make a difference within my team by delivering a best in class application which helps the business to grow as a whole.

projects.name: Qlimited Instrument Services
projects.description: This is a project based on creating a new website for the business of a family member, it is made using Node.js, Express and MongoDB and uses a completely custom CMS and backend built by myself. The site has not yet fully launched and therefore contains a lot of test data. It's basically my long-standing side project..

work.description: I am currently working in London as an iOS developer with YOOX NET-A-PORTER in which I am part of the mobile team responsible for the Net-A-Porter iPhone application. My key responsibilities include developing the application within an Agile team using both Objective C and Swift with the Cocoa Touch framework.

projects.description: Working in a test driven environment to develop the NET-A-PORTER iOS application using Objective C and Swift. Maintaining the current test infrastructure and adding further manual and automated test suites to ensure the quality of each release.
Regularly develop side projects in Swift and Node.js to develop and learn new skills and familarise myself with new frameworks. These are available here at my Github page.
Writing and maintaining shared libraries to interact with a number of RESTful JSON services
Worked within a small group to develop the first shoppable Apple TV application
Using Adobe analytics and other tools to track the user activity and ensure releases are providing measurable value for the business.
Contributed to multiple scripts, build tools and applications throughout the company.
Currently redesigning the application to use a tab bar rather than hamburger menu.

work.description: Created an application in node to dynamically generate a number of sitemaps for different categories and product pages using Node.js and Express.

projects.description: Enhanced and maintained several core production backend applications in Perl 5 utilising PostgreSQL, DBIx and the Catalyst MVC Framework.
Worked within an Agile team maintaining a legacy J2EE website using TDD and modern best practice principles.
Worked on various areas of the Mr.Porter web application implementing RESTful API endpoints.
Worked on various areas of the Mr.Porter site furniture, adding mobile-first responsive CSS for tablet and desktop versions.
